tyrantsSlash.name: Tyrant's Slash
tyrantsSlash.description: <b>Charge</c> and slam an apropriated sword down for <y>500%-2000% damage</c>.

tyrantsSlashBoosted.name: Slicing Luminesence
tyrantsSlashBoosted.description: <b>Charge</c> and swing an apropriated sword upwards for <y>500%-2000% damage</c>, summoning a rending maelstrom dealing <y>700%-1400% damage per second</c>.
